job.title: Digital Principal Data Scientist
job.description: pWe are a global leader in management consulting With offices in 50 cities across 30 countries We combine deep industry knowledge with specialized expertise in strategy finance operations technology risk management and organizational transformation Our 5000 professionals help clients optimize their business improve their IT operations and risk profile and accelerate their organizational performance to seize the most attractive opportunities Our professionals see what others dont challenge conventional thinking and consistently deliver innovative customized solutionsnbsp As a result we have a tangible impact on clients top and bottom linesnbsp Our clients are the CEOs and executive teams of the top Global 1000 companiesppstrongstrongppstrongPRACTICE OVERVIEWstrongppWe partner with clients to deliver breakthrough outcomes for their toughest digital challengesppWe blend the power of digital with deep industry expertise to tackle disruption and create impact By building strong capabilities and culture we accelerate and embed digital transformation Our people cocreate and grow customerfocused solutions that win We modernize technology and harness value from data and analytics We build resilience so our clients are ready for tomorrows risks and optimize operations for the future Above all we work collaboratively with our clients leaders employees stakeholders and customers to jointly define design and achieve lasting resultsppstrongstrongppstrongTHE ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIESstrongppNo two projects are the same Youll be working with varied and diverse teams to deliver unique and unprecedented products across industries The strongPrincipal Data Scientiststrong is primarily responsible for advancing our broad capabilities to use and deploy cutting edge data scientific tools and methods in our projects platforms and products She both anchors our current best practices by designing and building reusable data science assets and simultaneously works to keep us on the bleeding edge by understanding the very latest and most sophisticated methods and tools for grappling with extremely large scale and complex problems As a Data Scientist you will work alongside our partners in the Digital and other practice groups engage directly with clients to understand their business challenges and craft appropriate solutions to be delivered by specialists and consultantsppYour responsibilities will include for examplepulliExploring data and crafting models to answer core business problems that may not have a common blueprintliliGuiding data science consultants on the best path to solving problems in a specific technical domain in which you are the expertliliExplaining refining and crafting model insights and architecture to bring stakeholders through the journey of model buildingliliInventing and pioneer RampD efforts to bring new approaches and state of the art methods to our clientsliliCodifying best practice approaches to specific analytical problems in the form of accessible reusable patterns templates and code basesliliLeading efforts to standardize and industrialize solutions such that they can be robustly deployed into production andor scaled up far beyond the laptopscaleliulpppstrongYOUR EXPERIENCE amp QUALIFICATIONSstrongppYou are a wellrounded technologist who brings a wealth of realworld experience and apulliTechnical background in computer science data science machine learning artificial intelligence statistics or other quantitative and computational scienceliliA compelling track record of designing and deploying large scale technical solutions which deliver tangible ongoing valueliliDirect experience having built and deployed complex production systems that implement modern data scientific methods at scale and do so robustlyliliComfort in environments where large projects are timeboxed and therefore consequential design decisions may need to be made and acted upon rapidlyliliFluency with cluster computing environments and their associated technologies and a deep understanding of how to balance computational considerations with theoretical properties of potential solutionsliliAbility to contextswitch to provide support to dispersed teams which may need an expert hacker to unblock an especially challenging technical obstacleliliDemonstrated fluency in modern programming languages for data science covering a wide gamut from data storage and engineering frameworks through to machine learning librariesliliExpert knowledge of at least one and probably several core machine learning frameworks including but not limited to TensorFlow KerasTheano Torch Caffe MxNet ScikitLearn etcliliDeep understanding of the architecture performance characteristics and limitations of modern storage and computational frameworks with experience implementing solutions that leverage HDFSHive SparkMLlib Kafka etcliliA history of compelling side projects or contributions to the Open Source community is valued but not requiredliliSolid theoretical grounding in the mathematical core of the major ideas in data scienceliliExpert level understanding of a class of modelling or analytical techniques often supported by Masters or Doctorallevel research in the subjectliliDeep fluency in the mathematical primitives and generalizations of data science  eg expertise in Linear Algebra and Vector CalculusliliExperience presenting at highimpact data science conferences and solid linkages to the data science community eg via meetups continuing relationships with academics etc is highly valuedliliInterestbackground in Financial Services and capital markets in particular Health and Life Sciences Consumer Retail Energy or TransportationliulpstrongstrongppstrongYOUR ATTRIBUTESstrongppOur team comprises all sorts of people from all sorts of backgrounds We dont care whether youre loud or quiet funny or serious introverted or extroverted We do however ask that you havepulliAn undergraduate or advanced degree from a top academic programliliA genuine passion for technology and solving problemsliliA pragmatic approach to solutioning and deliveryliliExcellent communication skills both verbal and writtenliliA clear commitment to creating impactful solutions that solve our clients problemsliliThe ability to work fluidly and respectfully with our incredibly talented teamliliWillingness to travel when its safe to do so againliulpp
